sentence.Network_en: This is called cryogenics, and it has its drawbacks.
sentence.Network_cn: 这就是低温生物学, 当然这办法也有点麻烦.

sentence.Network_en: Humans vying for dominance will turn to genetics and cryogenics to compete.
sentence.Network_cn: 为主宰世界而竞争的人将转向在遗传学和低温学领域展开竞争.

sentence.Network_en: Taught in the speciality of Refrigeration & Cryogenics. The professional titles are: associate professor ( 1985 - 1992 ) .

entry.def: Cryogenics is a branch of physics that studies what happens to things at extremely low temperatures.

means.word_mean: 1. the branch of physics that studies the phenomena that occur at very low temperatures
